title: Zhanjiang City Stay with Outdoor Pool & Onsite Dining
description: Only minutes from the retail and entertainment district, Crowne Plaza Zhanjiang, an IHG Hotel offers a refined stay in the city centre. Be soothed by vistas of lush vegetation and the pristine volcanic lake at Huguangyan National Geopark and recentre yourself with a visit to Lengyan Temple. Cool off with a dip in the pool before sumptuous dim sum at Chao Jiang Chun or a soothing Chinese tea in the garden-style lobby, complete with a koi pond and waterfall.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Zhanjiang, an IHG hotel
offer_address: No.31, Leshan Da Dao, Zhangjiang 524022, China
